segments.text: Just dab it all over your face and then take a look at the symbols that appear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ... hearts , stars and some weird looking things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those are money bags , and they represent your financial situation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So decode this for me , Madame Psycho .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you have three hearts â€” lucky in love tonight . Dress up and go on a date !
segments.speaker: S1
